metadata.title: CVE-2024-50143 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:udf: fix uninit-value use in udf_get_fileshortadCheck for overflow when computing alen in udf_current_aext to mitigatelater uninit-value use in udf_get_fileshortad KMSAN bug[1].After applying the patch reproducer did not trigger any issue[2].[1] https://syzkaller.appspot.com/bug?extid=8901c4560b7ab5c2f9df[2] https://syzkaller.appspot.com/x/log.txt?x=10242227980000

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
